MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Watling Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.24am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Railway Substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.57am on Monday 19th October 2020.
